name: Hyper Rollergirl
description:
Time to transform and put on your rollerblades - jump the quarterpipes, ride the walls, and soar through the air!

Become the magical girl of your dreams and free the arcade visitor's captures spirits while defeating the corrupted dragon in Hyper Rollergirl!

  • Steer with Mouse
  • Dash with LMB
  • Jump with RMB
  • W for air control
